FOUND IN: War crimes trials (when the lawsuit involves allegations of illegal actions during a conflict)
Athena: Greek goddess associated with wisdom, courage, and strategic warfare
Hazardous event: Vesuvius serves as a reminder of the dangers posed by active volcanoes.
Forfeit: A voluntary surrender by one party in a competition or dispute due to certain conditions being met.
Mythological allusion: Reference to myths from various cultures that serve as an indirect expression of ideas.
